headline: As Short Sellers Take Aim at AppLovin Stock Again, How Should You Play APP?
summary: Short seller CapitalWatch is taking aim at AppLovin with fresh allegations, leaving investors torn between potential risk and growth.

headline: Do Compliance Allegations Reframe AppLovin’s (APP) AI Adtech Ambitions as a Governance Stress Test?
summary: In recent days, several short-seller and independent research reports accused AppLovin and its primary shareholder of facilitating money laundering through its adtech platform and complex shareholder structure, while the company issued a firm rebuttal calling the claims false and highlighting its compliance controls. The controversy has intensified focus on AppLovin’s transformation into an AI-driven advertising infrastructure business, raising fresh questions about how its growth model...
